00085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 // Class stDFNode
00087 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 class stDFNode{
00113 
00114    public:
00115 
00119       enum stDFNodeType{
00123          INDEX = 0x4449, // In little endian "ID"
00124 
00128          LEAF = 0x464C // In little endian "LF"
00129       };//end stNodeType
00130 
00134       virtual ~stDFNode(){
00135       }//end ~stDFNode()
00136 
00143       stNodeType GetNodeType(){
00144          return Header->Type;
00145       }//end GetNodeType
00146 
00152       stPage * GetPage(){
00153          return Page;
00154       }//end GetPage
00155 
00161       stPageID GetPageID(){
00162          return Page->GetPageID();
00163       }//end GetPage
00164 
00171       static stDFNode * CreateNode(stPage * page);
00172 
00181       stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
00182          return this->Header->Occupation;
00183       }//end GetNumberOfEntries
00184 
00196       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object) = 0;
00197 
00208       virtual const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx) = 0;
00209 
00220       virtual stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx) = 0;
00221 
00225       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius() = 0;
00226 
00230       void RemoveAll(){
00231 
00232          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00233          stNodeType type;
00234          type = Header->Type;
00235          Page->Clear();
00236          Header->Type = type;
00237          #else
00238          this->Header->Occupation = 0;
00239          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00240       }//end RemoveAll
00241 
00245       virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount() = 0;
00246 
00250       static stSize GetGlobalOverhead(){
00251          return sizeof(stDFNodeHeader);
00252       }//end GetGlobalOverhead()
00253       
00254    protected:
00258       #pragma pack(1)
00259       typedef struct stDFNodeHeader{
00263          stNodeType Type;
00264 
00268          stCount Occupation;
00269       } stDFNodeHeader; //end stHeader
00270       #pragma pack()
00271 
00275       stDFNodeHeader * Header;
00276 
00280       stPage * Page;
00281 
00287       stDFNode(stPage * page){
00288          this->Page = page;
00289          Header = (stDFNodeHeader *)(this->Page->GetData());
00290       }//end stDFNode
00291 };//end stDFNode

00293 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00294 // Class stDFIndexNode
00295 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00325 // +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00326 // | Type | Occupation | PgID0 | Dist0 | GRDist0 | NEnt0 | Radius0 | OffSet0 |...|PgIDn | Distn |  GRDistn | NEntn | Radiusn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
00327 // +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00328 class stDFIndexNode: public stDFNode{
00329 
00330    public:
00331 
00336       #pragma pack(1)
00337       typedef struct stDFIndexEntry{
00341          stPageID PageID;
00342 
00346          stDistance Distance;
00347 
00351          stDistance * FieldDistance;
00352 
00356          stCount NEntries;
00357 
00361          stDistance Radius;
00362 
00368          stSize Offset;
00369       } stDFIndexEntry; //end stIndexEntry
00370       #pragma pack()
00371 
00383       stDFIndexNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
00384 
00398       stDFIndexEntry & GetIndexEntry(stCount idx){
00399          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00400          if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
00401             throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00402          }//end if
00403          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00404 
00405          return Entries[idx];
00406       }//end GetIndexEntry
00407 
00426       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
00427 
00431       int GetRepresentativeEntry();
00432 
00443       const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx);
00444 
00454       stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx);
00455 
00464       void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
00465 
00469       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
00470 
00474       virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount();
00475 
00479       static stSize GetIndexEntryOverhead(){
00480          return sizeof(stDFIndexEntry);
00481       }//end GetIndexEntryOverhead()
00482 
00483    private:
00484 
00488       stDFIndexEntry * Entries;
00489 
00493       stSize GetFree();
00494 
00495 };//end stDFIndexPage

00526 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00527 // | Type | Occupation | Dist0 | GRDist0 | OffSet0 | Distn | GRDistn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
00528 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00529 class stDFLeafNode: public stDFNode{
00530 
00531    public:
00532 
00536       #pragma pack(1)
00537       typedef struct stDFLeafEntry{
00541          stDistance Distance;
00542 
00546          stDistance * FieldDistance;
00547 
00553          stSize Offset;
00554       } stDFLeafEntry; //end stLeafEntry
00555       #pragma pack()
00556 
00568       stDFLeafNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
00569 
00583       stDFLeafEntry &GetLeafEntry(stCount idx){
00584          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00585          if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
00586             throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00587          }//end if
00588          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00589 
00590          return Entries[idx];
00591       }//end GetLeafEntry
00592 
00611       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
00612 
00616       int GetRepresentativeEntry();
00617 
00628       const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx);
00629 
00639       stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx);
00640 
00651       void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
00652 
00656       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
00657 
00661       virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount(){
00662          return GetNumberOfEntries();
00663       }//end GetTotalObjectCount()
00664 
00668       static stSize GetLeafEntryOverhead(){
00669          return sizeof(stDFLeafEntry);
00670       }//end GetLeafEntryOverhead()
00671 
00678       stDistance * GetFieldDistance(stCount idx){
00679          return Entries[idx].FieldDistance;
00680       }//end GetFieldDistance
00681 
00682    private:
00683 
00687       stDFLeafEntry * Entries;
00688 
00692       stSize GetFree();
00693       
00694 };//end stDFLeafNode

00697 // Class stDFMemLeafNode
00698 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00717 template < class ObjectType >
00718 class stDFMemLeafNode{
00719 
00720    public:
00721 
00728       stDFMemLeafNode(stDFLeafNode * leafNode);
00729 
00738       stDFLeafNode * ReleaseNode();
00739 
00750       bool Add(ObjectType * obj, stDistance distance);
00751 
00755       stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
00756          return this->NumEntries;
00757       }//end GetNumberOfObjects
00758 
00766       ObjectType * ObjectAt(stCount idx){
00767          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00768             if (idx >= this->numEntries){
00769                throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00770             }//end if
00771          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00772          return Entries[idx].Object;
00773       }//end ObjectAt
00774 
00781       ObjectType * LastObject(){
00782          return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Object;
00783       }//end LastObject
00784 
00790       ObjectType * RepObject(){
00791          return Entries[0].Object;
00792       }//end RepObject
00793 
00800       stDistance DistanceAt(stCount idx){
00801          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00802             if (idx >= this->numEntries){
00803                throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00804             }//end if
00805          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00806 
00807          return Entries[idx].Distance;
00808       }//end DistanceAt
00809 
00814       stDistance LastDistance(){
00815          return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
00816       }//end LastDistance
00817 
00824       ObjectType * Remove(stCount idx);
00825 
00829       ObjectType * PopObject();
00830 
00836       bool CanAdd(ObjectType * obj){
00837          // Does it fit ?
00838          if (obj->GetSerializedSize() + stDFLeafNode::GetLeafEntryOverhead() +
00839              this->UsedSize > this->MaximumSize){
00840             // No, it doesn't.
00841             return false;
00842          }//end if
00843          // yes, it does.
00844          return true;
00845       }//end CanAdd
00846 
00852       stDistance GetMinimumRadius(){
00853          return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
00854       }//end GetMinimumRadius                    
00855 
00861       stSize GetFreeSize(){
00862          return (this->maximumSize - this->usedSize);
00863       }//end GetFreeSize
00864 
00865    private:
00866    
00870       struct stDFMemNodeEntry{
00874          ObjectType * Object;
00875 
00879          stDistance Distance;
00880       };
00881 
00885       stCount NumEntries;
00886       
00890       stCount Capacity;
00891       
00895       stDFMemNodeEntry * Entries;
00896       
00900       stSize MaximumSize;
00901       
00905       stSize UsedSize;
00906       
00910       stDFLeafNode * SrcLeafNode; 
00911 
00920       int InsertPosition(stDistance distance); 
00921       
00926       void Resize(stCount incSize = 16);
00927       
00928 };//end stDFMemLeafNode
